dmca.title: [ABUSE] FW: Copyright Violation!!!!
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, March 21, 2005 11:40 AM
To: admin@ann-angel.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] FW: Copyright Violation!!!!]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] FW: Copyright Violation!!!!
Date: Sun, 20 Mar 2005 04:42:21 -0500
From: AnnAngel Admin. <admin@ann-angel.com>
Reply-To: admin@ann-angel.com
Organization: Digital Angel Images LLC
To: <abuse@servermatrix.com>





  _____

From: anna [mailto:anna@ann-angel.com]
Sent: Thursday, March 17, 2005 1:00 AM
To: 'abuse@servermatrix.com'
Subject: Copyright Violation!!!!



Hello,



My name is Catalin Radu. I am the webmaster of http://ann-angel.com
<http://ann-angel.com/> .   I am writing to you because one of your clients
is using your servers to illegally post galleries from our member's section
of Ann-Angel.com.  The offending pages is here:



http://www.tuweberotica.com/privado/ann-angel.htm



Please remove this from your servers immediately!  They do not have our
permission to do this and it is a violation of copyright laws.



Also, if you can please verify the email contact you guys have for this
person for me so I can contact him directly.  Is it..info@presencianet.com
or this..hostmaster@nomitek.com?



Thank you for your assistance in solving this matter!



Sincerely,

Catalin Radu



http://digitalangelimages.com







- --
- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
THe Planet Internet Services, LLC
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.6 (GNU/Linux)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFCPwbVvK/XpJs6oyURAoK8AJ94f4psttceBPAINVCmARF65lW8AACeLSbk
0O8Y1P6nd7GWNEhrL77OUH8=
=Lvsj
-----END PGP SIGNATURE---
